channel.title: Comments on: The Importance of “Trash Fantasy”
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Maris Laura Jahnke
item.dc:creator: Maris Laura Jahnke
item.description: Basically anything by Maria V Snyder or Jacqueline Carey is my "trash fantasy"!
item.content:encoded: Basically anything by Maria V Snyder or Jacqueline Carey is my “trash fantasy”!

item.title: By: RC
item.dc:creator: RC
item.description: Goblin Emperor by Katherine Addison is 100% my go-to comfort read. It's embarrassing the number of times I've listened to that audiobook.
item.content:encoded: Goblin Emperor by Katherine Addison is 100% my go-to comfort read. It’s embarrassing the number of times I’ve listened to that audiobook.
